title: Rename the Jar loading classes to load any  blobs
description:
The classes used to load jars from blob store can be used for loading any blobs. 


	JarRepository ->BlobRepository
	JarContentRef -> BlobContentRef
	JarContent -> BlobContent

SOLR-8719 renamed classes to make their usage generic
